Detailed Description

A special wxApp.

Doesn't work yet on wxGTK. This should be another way to use wxKeyBinder: the usual way is to call wxKeyBinder::Attach to define the windows whose events will be filtered for the hotkeys... wxBinderApp should avoid all calls to wxKeyBinderAttach filtering the events using the wxApp::FilterEvent() function.
